parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: WaitingRoomEventId
parameters.description: The ID of the waiting room event. This parameter is optional. You can specify this parameter to query a specific waiting room event.

parameters.name: WaitingRoomId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the waiting room, which can be obtained by calling the [ListWaitingRooms](~~2850279~~) operation.
